snippet: The show, which has played for seven years on the West End, has changed the National Theater and perhaps the industry.
abstract: Nick Stafford play War Horse, which has become cultural phenomenon in Britain, is set to close after seven-year run at New London Theater in London's West End; huge financial success of show paved way for Royal National Theater to diverge from traditional business model of country's government-subsidized theater companies.
lead_paragraph: The show, which has played for seven years on the West End, has changed the National Theater and perhaps the industry.

headline.main: ‘War Horse’ Closes in Britain, but Its Influence Gallops On
headline.print_headline: ‘War Horse’ Retires; the Race Is Changed
